Program FAQ

The face-to-face class has Sec “01”. The online courses have Sec “740”. Hybrid courses will be “FX1”

CY501-01 Intro to Cybersecurity: face-to-face CY501-740 Basics of Cybersecurity: online CY501-FX1 Basics of Cybersecurity: hybrid Hybrid (FX1) course will count as face-to-face class for international students.
